quotes.quote: They're her children. More exactly, they're the children of her rage.
quotes.author: Dr. Hal Raglan

quotes.quote: They'll see and they'll know, and they'll say, "Why, she wouldn't even harm a fly..."
quotes.author: Norman Bates

quotes.quote: Who's going to believe a talking head? Get a job in a sideshow.
quotes.author: Herbert West
